channel.title: Windows 7 desktop backgrounds
channel.description: Hey, you know that wonderful feature that lets you dump a bunch of images into a folder then windows 7 will cycle through those images as your desktop background, well I was wondering if it was possible to assign a key that lets you change to the next image on shuffle, because right click/left click isn't working for me. cheers
